item.title: Prime Securities Ltd Falls 3.89%: Technical Shifts and Earnings Impact Weekly
item.description: Prime Securities Ltd’s shares declined by 3.89% over the week ending 23 January 2026, closing at ₹264.30 from ₹275.00 the previous Friday. This underperformance slightly exceeded the Sensex’s 3.31% fall during the same period, reflecting a challenging week marked by technical momentum shifts, mixed signals, and a sharp profit decline reported in Q3 FY26. Time: 39 minutes ago

item.title: Shekhawati Industries Ltd Drops 22.63% Amidst Steep Declines and Sudden Rally
item.description: Shekhawati Industries Ltd endured a challenging week from 19 to 23 January 2026, with its stock price plummeting 22.63% from Rs.17.81 to Rs.13.78, significantly underperforming the Sensex’s 3.31% decline over the same period. The week was marked by a series of fresh 52-week lows, deteriorating financial results, and a late-session surge that capped the week with a sharp rebound. This review analyses the key events and market dynamics that shaped the stock’s volatile performance. Time: 39 minutes ago

item.title: Supreme Petrochem Falls 7.09% Amid Earnings Pressure and Quality Downgrade

item.title: Black Box Ltd Falls 5.31%: 6 Key Factors Driving the Weekly Decline

item.title: Frontier Springs Ltd Declines 2.52% Despite Technical Strength: 5 Key Events Shaping the Week
item.description: Frontier Springs Ltd experienced a volatile week from 19 to 23 January 2026, ending with a 2.52% decline to close at Rs.4,344.90, while the Sensex fell 3.31%. The stock showed strong intraday rallies early in the week, including an 8.23% surge on 19 January and an 8.71% jump on 22 January, but faced sharp reversals and selling pressure midweek. Despite the weekly loss, Frontier Springs outperformed the Sensex by 0.79 percentage points, reflecting resilience amid broader market weakness and sector-specific headwinds. Time: 39 minutes ago
